pipelines.name: Data Validation Layer
pipelines.description: Validates incoming data against schema rules. Catches bad data before it pollutes downstream systems.

pipelines.name: Automated Testing Suite
pipelines.description: Continuous data quality testing. Detects regressions early.

pipelines.name: ETL Performance Tuning
pipelines.description: Optimizes extract-transform-load processes for faster data delivery.

pipelines.name: Incremental Load Strategy
pipelines.description: Only processes changed data instead of full refreshes. Massive time savings.

pipelines.name: Stream Processing Engine
pipelines.description: Processes data in real-time as it arrives. No more batch delays.

pipelines.name: Data Profiling & Monitoring
pipelines.description: Continuously analyzes data patterns and detects anomalies.

pipelines.name: Intelligent Deduplication
pipelines.description: Removes duplicate records using fuzzy matching and ML.

pipelines.name: Data Lineage Tracking
pipelines.description: Tracks data from source to destination. Essential for debugging and compliance.

pipelines.name: Automated Incident Remediation
pipelines.description: Self-healing pipelines that automatically fix common issues.

pipelines.name: Intelligent Caching
pipelines.description: Caches frequently accessed data to reduce load times.

pipelines.name: Advanced Data Compression
pipelines.description: Compresses data for faster transfers and lower storage costs.

pipelines.name: Parallel Processing Framework
pipelines.description: Distributes workload across multiple nodes for faster processing.

pipelines.name: Schema Evolution Management
pipelines.description: Handles schema changes gracefully without breaking downstream systems.

pipelines.name: Sensitive Data Masking
pipelines.description: Automatically masks PII and sensitive data for compliance.

pipelines.name: ML Feature Store
pipelines.description: Pre-computed features for machine learning models. Speeds up model training.

pipelines.name: ML Anomaly Detection
pipelines.description: Machine learning model that detects unusual data patterns automatically.

pipelines.name: Enterprise Data Catalog
pipelines.description: Searchable catalog of all data assets with business context.

pipelines.name: Cost Optimization Engine
pipelines.description: Automatically optimizes storage and compute costs without sacrificing performance.
